attributes.action: prosecute all  MP's that have defrauded taxpayers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If anyone else claimed for something they were not entitled to they would be arrested and prosecuted with fraud and deception as it is a criminal offence.

rejection.details: Government cannot prosecute individuals or organisations. It is for the police to investigate and for the Crown Prosecution Service to decide whether there is grounds for a case, and to prosecute it.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
